definition: body and soul/physical and spiritual/material form and internal spirit

sentences.english: The idea of spirit body combination is the core of TCM theory of combining body with spirit.
sentences.chinese: “形神合一論”是中醫心身統一思想的核心內容。

sentences.english: So, the version incarnating"spirit likeness" and"appearance likeness"can be ranked as the ideal …
sentences.chinese: “形神皆備”的譯本，纔是理想的譯本。

sentences.english: Proposes the establishment in" the relationship of form and spirit namely ' the rationale."
sentences.chinese: 提出建立在”形神相即’理論基礎的。

sentences.english: On 12 class stone stairses, it is each to carve form absolute being fierce very of stone statue.
sentences.chinese: 十二級石階上，每一級都雕塑着一座形神凶煞的石像。

sentences.english: Our ancient music appearance-sprite theory attained the perfect state by his elucidating .
sentences.chinese: 經過嵇康的闡發，我國古代音樂形神理論終臻完備。

sentences.english: Character portraits, the clothing lines smooth, full of different texture.
sentences.chinese: 人物形神兼備，衣紋流暢，富有不同的質感。

sentences.english: The unity between the body and the spirit ensures the existence of life.
sentences.chinese: 形神統一是生命存在的主要保證。

sentences.english: The doctrine of TCM Qizhi highly sums up the body-mind theory of TCM.
sentences.chinese: 氣質學說是中醫形神理論的高度概括。

definition: lit. the soul flies away and scatters (idiom)/fig. to be frightened stiff/spooked out of one's mind/terror-stricken
three immortal souls in Daoism, representing spirit and intellect
three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
seven mortal forms in Daoism, representing carnal life and desires/contrasted with 三魂 three immortal souls
good luck/Nature (as the mother of all things)
the real body (of Buddha or a God)/true effigy
lit. spirit and marrow/the essential character
